title: Establishes a two dollar surcharge on the purchase of sexually oriented media
summary: Establishes a two dollar surcharge on the purchase of sexually oriented media.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          290

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. ORTIZ -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Economic Development, Job Creation, Commerce and Industry

       AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to establishing  a
         two  dollar  surcharge  on  sexually  oriented media; and to amend the
         state finance law, in relation to establishing the crime victims fund

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The general business law is amended by adding a new section
    2  399-ddd to read as follows:
    3    S 399-DDD. SEXUALLY ORIENTED MEDIA; SURCHARGE. 1. FOR PURPOSES OF THIS
    4  SECTION, THE FOLLOWING TERMS SHALL HAVE THE FOLLOWING MEANINGS:
    5    A. "NUDE" SHALL MEAN:
    6    (I) ENTIRELY UNCLOTHED; OR
    7    (II) CLOTHED IN A MANNER THAT LEAVES UNCOVERED OR VISIBLE THROUGH LESS
    8  THAN  FULLY  OPAQUE CLOTHING ANY PORTION OF THE BREASTS BELOW THE TOP OF
    9  THE AREOLA OF THE BREASTS, IF THE PERSON IS FEMALE, OR  ANY  PORTION  OF
   10  THE GENITALS OR BUTTOCKS; AND
   11    B.  "SEXUALLY  ORIENTED  MEDIA"  SHALL  MEAN A MAGAZINE, VIDEO, DVD OR
   12  INTERNET WEBSITE WHOSE DOMAIN NAME IS REGISTERED IN  THIS  STATE,  WHERE
   13  THE  CONTENT  OF  SUCH MAGAZINE, VIDEO, DVD OR INTERNET WEBSITE FEATURES
   14  NUDE PICTURES OR NUDE PERFORMANCES.
   15    2. A SURCHARGE SHALL BE IMPOSED ON  ANY  SEXUALLY  ORIENTED  MEDIA  AS
   16  FOLLOWS:
   17    A.  FOR  EACH  MAGAZINE,  VIDEO  OR  DVD  PURCHASED IN THIS STATE, TWO
   18  DOLLARS FOR EACH MAGAZINE, VIDEO OR DVD PURCHASED; OR
   19    B. FOR EACH DOWNLOAD PURCHASED FROM AN INTERNET WEBSITE,  TWO  DOLLARS
   20  FOR EACH DOWNLOAD PURCHASED.
   21    3.  ANY  PERSON,  FIRM, CORPORATION, PARTNERSHIP OR ANY OTHER BUSINESS
   22  ENTITY THAT SELLS SEXUALLY  ORIENTED  MEDIA  SHALL  BE  LIABLE  FOR  THE
   23  COLLECTION  OF  THE  SURCHARGE  IMPOSED  BY THIS SECTION. EVERY BUSINESS

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03926-01-1

       A. 290                              2

    1  SUBJECT TO THE PROVISIONS OF THIS SECTION SHALL REMIT THE TOTAL OF FUNDS
    2  COLLECTED FROM THE SURCHARGE ESTABLISHED PURSUANT TO THIS SECTION TO THE
    3  COMMISSIONER OF TAXATION AND FINANCE FOR DEPOSIT INTO THE CRIME  VICTIMS
    4  FUND  ESTABLISHED  PURSUANT TO SECTION EIGHTY-SEVEN OF THE STATE FINANCE
    5  LAW.
    6    S 2. The state finance law is amended by adding a new  section  87  to
    7  read as follows:
    8    S  87. CRIME VICTIMS FUND. 1. THERE IS HEREBY ESTABLISHED IN THE JOINT
    9  CUSTODY OF THE STATE COMPTROLLER AND THE COMMISSIONER  OF  TAXATION  AND
   10  FINANCE A SPECIAL REVENUE FUND TO BE KNOWN AS THE "CRIME VICTIMS FUND".
   11    2.  SUCH  FUND  SHALL  CONSIST  OF  THE  REVENUES RECEIVED PURSUANT TO
   12  SECTION THREE HUNDRED NINETY-NINE-DDD OF THE GENERAL BUSINESS  LAW,  AND
   13  ALL OTHER MONIES APPROPRIATED, CREDITED, OR TRANSFERRED THERETO FROM ANY
   14  OTHER FUND OR SOURCE PURSUANT TO LAW.
   15    3.  MONIES  OF THE FUND WHEN ALLOCATED, SHALL BE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE
   16  COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTIONAL SERVICES TO FUND PROGRAMS  FOR  VICTIMS  OF
   17  CRIME, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, VICTIMS OF DOMESTIC VIOLENCE, HATE
   18  CRIMES, HUMAN TRAFFICKING AND CHILD PROSTITUTION.
   19    4.  MONEY  SHALL  BE PAYABLE FROM THE FUND ON THE AUDIT AND WARRANT OF
   20  THE STATE COMPTROLLER ON VOUCHERS APPROVED AND CERTIFIED BY THE  COMMIS-
   21  SIONER OF CORRECTIONAL SERVICES.
   22    S  3.  This  act shall take effect on the thirtieth day after it shall
   23  have become a law.
